title: The Furos Stories
description: THE BIRD OF SPACE From a dark star, warmed by internal heat, a green-hued man comes to Earth to take back captives to the cattle-pens of Furos.THE CATTLE OF FUROSFrank Alison pursues the green-faced man and the girl in red to the dark star.First published in two issues of the famous pulp magazine Weird Tales in 1926, these two stories by Everil Worrell are a psychedelic adventure into vintage sci-fi.
author: Everil Worrell
